title: Strengthening Customer Service Practical Competencies: Computational Competency Assessment Project Through Participatory Design

context.prior_knowledge: Basic computational thinking skills and language learning experience
context.additional_context: Service/Customer Engagement Role-Specific Competency Development Program

learning_goals: Students can explain computational problem definition and solution strategies in language-learning contexts with over 80% accuracy
Students can revise and improve projects at least twice by incorporating peer and instructor feedback
Through rubric-based self-assessment, students can diagnose their computational competencies at 6.0 or higher on the VAS scale (1-10)
difficulty: Moderate - Standard complexity with some constraints
